\sphinxAtStartPar
Welcome to the MMIV documentation guide.

\sphinxAtStartPar
This documentation demonstrates how to create technical documentation using Sphinx.


\chapter{About MMIV}
\label{\detokenize{index:about-mmiv}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
The Mohn Medical Imaging and Visualization Centre (MMIV) is a research centre at Haukeland University Hospital in Bergen, Norway.

\sphinxAtStartPar
MMIV focuses on:
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Advanced medical imaging research

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Machine learning applications in healthcare

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Precision medicine through imaging biomarkers

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Clinical translation of research innovations

\end{itemize}


\chapter{Documentation Examples}
\label{\detokenize{index:documentation-examples}}
\sphinxstepscope


\section{Basic Documentation Elements}
\label{\detokenize{basic-elements:basic-documentation-elements}}\label{\detokenize{basic-elements::doc}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
This chapter shows basic formatting in reStructuredText.


\subsection{Text Formatting}
\label{\detokenize{basic-elements:text-formatting}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
You can format text in different ways:
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{Bold text} using double asterisks

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstyleemphasis{Italic text} using single asterisks

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{Code text}} using double backticks

\end{itemize}


\subsection{Lists}
\label{\detokenize{basic-elements:lists}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
Simple bullet list:
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
First item

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Second item

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Third item

\end{itemize}

\sphinxAtStartPar
Numbered list:
\begin{enumerate}
\sphinxsetlistlabels{\arabic}{enumi}{enumii}{}{.}%
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
First step

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Second step

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Third step

\end{enumerate}

\section{Code Examples}
\label{\detokenize{code-examples:code-examples}}\label{\detokenize{code-examples::doc}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
This chapter shows how to include code in documentation.


\subsection{Basic Code Block}
\label{\detokenize{code-examples:basic-code-block}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
Simple code without highlighting:

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{k}{def}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{n+nf}{hello\PYGZus{}world}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{:}
    \PYG{n+nb}{print}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{Hello, World!}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{)}
    \PYG{k}{return} \PYG{k+kc}{True}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}


\subsection{Python Code}
\label{\detokenize{code-examples:python-code}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
Python code with syntax highlighting:

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{k}{def}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{n+nf}{analyze\PYGZus{}data}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n}{data}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{:}
\PYG{+w}{    }\PYG{l+s+sd}{\PYGZdq{}\PYGZdq{}\PYGZdq{}}
\PYG{l+s+sd}{    Analyze input data.}

\PYG{l+s+sd}{    Parameters:}
\PYG{l+s+sd}{    \PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}}
\PYG{l+s+sd}{    data : list}
\PYG{l+s+sd}{        Input data}

\PYG{l+s+sd}{    Returns:}
\PYG{l+s+sd}{    \PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}}
\PYG{l+s+sd}{    dict}
\PYG{l+s+sd}{        Results}
\PYG{l+s+sd}{    \PYGZdq{}\PYGZdq{}\PYGZdq{}}
    \PYG{n}{result} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{n+nb}{sum}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n}{data}\PYG{p}{)} \PYG{o}{/} \PYG{n+nb}{len}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n}{data}\PYG{p}{)}
    \PYG{k}{return} \PYG{p}{\PYGZob{}}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{l+s+s1}{average}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{p}{:} \PYG{n}{result}\PYG{p}{,} \PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{l+s+s1}{count}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{p}{:} \PYG{n+nb}{len}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n}{data}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{\PYGZcb{}}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}


\subsection{JavaScript Code}
\label{\detokenize{code-examples:javascript-code}}
\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{k+kd}{function}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{n+nx}{processData}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n+nx}{data}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{p}{\PYGZob{}}
\PYG{+w}{    }\PYG{k+kd}{const}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{n+nx}{result}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{n+nx}{data}\PYG{p}{.}\PYG{n+nx}{map}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n+nx}{item}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{p}{=\PYGZgt{}}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{n+nx}{item}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{o}{*}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{l+m+mf}{2}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{;}
\PYG{+w}{    }\PYG{k}{return}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{p}{\PYGZob{}}
\PYG{+w}{        }\PYG{n+nx}{original}\PYG{o}{:}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{n+nx}{data}\PYG{p}{,}
\PYG{+w}{        }\PYG{n+nx}{processed}\PYG{o}{:}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{n+nx}{result}\PYG{p}{,}
\PYG{+w}{        }\PYG{n+nx}{length}\PYG{o}{:}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{n+nx}{data}\PYG{p}{.}\PYG{n+nx}{length}
\PYG{+w}{    }\PYG{p}{\PYGZcb{}}\PYG{p}{;}
\PYG{p}{\PYGZcb{}}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}


\subsection{Inline Code}

\subsection{Configuration Example}
\label{\detokenize{code-examples:configuration-example}}

YAML configuration:

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n+nt}{project}\PYG{p}{:}
\PYG{+w}{  }\PYG{n+nt}{name}\PYG{p}{:}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{l+s}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s}{Documentation}\PYG{n+nv}{ }\PYG{l+s}{Example}\PYG{l+s}{\PYGZdq{}}
\PYG{+w}{  }\PYG{n+nt}{version}\PYG{p}{:}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{l+s}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s}{1.0.0}\PYG{l+s}{\PYGZdq{}}

\PYG{n+nt}{settings}\PYG{p}{:}
\PYG{+w}{  }\PYG{n+nt}{output}\PYG{p}{:}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{l+s}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s}{html}\PYG{l+s}{\PYGZdq{}}
\PYG{+w}{  }\PYG{n+nt}{theme}\PYG{p}{:}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{l+s}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s}{default}\PYG{l+s}{\PYGZdq{}}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}

\subsection{Mathematical Formulas}
\label{\detokenize{advanced-features:mathematical-formulas}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
Basic math formula:
\begin{equation*}
\begin{split}f(x) = \frac{1}{\sigma\sqrt{2\pi}} e^{-\frac{1}{2}\left(\frac{x-\mu}{\sigma}\right)^2}\end{split}
\end{equation*}
\sphinxAtStartPar
Inline math: \(E = mc^2\)

\PYG{n}{Data} \PYG{n}{Flow}\PYG{p}{:}

\PYG{n}{Input} \PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{o}{\PYGZgt{}} \PYG{n}{Processing} \PYG{o}{\PYGZhy{}}\PYG{o}{\PYGZgt{}} \PYG{n}{Output}
          \PYG{o}{|}
          \PYG{n}{v}
      \PYG{n}{Validation}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}
